params.claimAddress: Address that can claim the locked tokens
params.refundAddress: Address that locked the tokens and can refund them
params.timelock: Block height after which the locked tokens can be refunded
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token locked for the swap

returns._0: True if the signature is valid, false otherwise

claim(bytes32,uint256,address,address,ui.details: The signature must be created by the claim address over the claim data using EIP-712 standardThe recovered claim address from the signature must match the intended claim address for the swapThe claimed funds are sent to msg.sender (the transaction executor), not the claim address that signed

returns._0: recoveredAddress The address that signed the claim message (recovered from signature)

claim(bytes32,uint256,address,address,ad.notice: Claims tokens locked in the contract for a specified claim address
Claims tokens locked in the contract as commitment for a specified claim address

claim(bytes32,uint256,address,address,ui.notice: Claims tokens locked in the contract

Claims tokens locked in the contract using an EIP-712 signature from the claim addressThis function allows anyone to execute a claim on behalf of the intended claim address by providing a valid signature

claimBatch(address,(bytes32,uint256,addr.notice: Claims multiple swaps Supports both commitment and normal swaps

lock(bytes32,uint256,address,address,uin.notice: Locks tokens in the contractThe refund address is the sender of the transactionUse bytes32(0) as preimageHash only for commitment-based swaps to avoid accidental misuse

refund(bytes32,uint256,address,address,a.notice: Refunds tokens locked in the contract after the timeout for a specified refund address

refund(bytes32,uint256,address,address,u.notice: Refunds tokens locked in the contract after the timeout

refundCooperative(bytes32,uint256,addres.notice: Refunds tokens locked in the contract with an EIP-712 signature of the claimAddress
Refunds tokens locked in the contract with an EIP-712 signature of the claimAddress
